It may seem like Le Creuset’s fall-themed collection only just dropped — I’m absolutely obsessed with all of the brand’s pumpkin-shaped dishes — but you can get a jump on preparing your kitchen for the winter holidays right now, too. It’s never too early to get in the spirit, right? Before you know it, Halloween will be in the rearview mirror and the next season will have already kicked off. Scrambling at the last minute to get all of your decor in order sucks the fun out of it. Le Creuset seems to share the same opinion, if its recent launch of the Holly Collection is anything to go by.

The collection is just as festive and gorgeous as you’d expect from the renowned stoneware brand. Though you can opt for more substantial pieces like the Chef’s Oven and Saucier pan, you can also start smaller — which might sound more appealing if you want to gradually introduce holiday items into your kitchen. The Holly Mug is the perfect way to begin, and it’s only going for $20. Read on for why it’s a must-have (for you and a giftee)!

What Is Le Creuset’s Holly Collection Mug?

Those familiar with the brand know that Le Creuset produces quality products, even when it comes to its smaller, budget-friendly ones. You’re sure to use this mug every day during the next several months — and in the years to come. Heck, you’ll probably even use it during other seasons because the quality is so high and the design is subtle enough. You’ll find the embossed shape of holly circling the base of the mug, as well as the brand’s logo. The material — which is built to withstand daily use — is made even stronger by the colorful glaze coating. It’s resistant to chips, scratches, and stains, and it also makes the surface nonporous and nonstick. As a result, cleanup is painless (and the fact that it’s dishwasher-safe helps, too.) The stoneware also has the benefit of first-rate heat retention, so you can sip your drink for an impressive amount of time without it getting cold.

While you hold onto your cup, it’ll be impossible not to feel some holiday cheer. In addition to the embossed design, the mug comes in three of the brand’s popular colors: Artichaut, a deep green, and Cerise, a vibrant red. You can also go with White, the most neutral of them all. Regardless of which option you choose, you’re sure to get a ton of use out of it when you make all of your cozy drinks this fall and winter. We have plenty of inspiration for you on that front (which you can find here and here). Once you add the Holly Mug to your cart, you can start planning which ones you’ll make!

Buy: Holly Collection Mug, $20
